# expressionBlock

**Instance Property**

The block that executes to evaluate the expression.

## Declaration

```swift
var expressionBlock: (Any?, [NSExpression], NSMutableDictionary?) -> Any { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **init(block:arguments:)**: Creates an expression object that uses the block for evaluating objects.
